ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Free tools to analyze Small angle scattering data
Free tools to analyze Small angle scattering data

name: freesas

about.summary: Free tools to analyze Small angle scattering data

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: freesas
  version: 2026.2.0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/freesas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63252f631ad1fb614be15e881148cd60ae78bbf0984c0a23ea0600e4726db4b5

build:
  number: 1
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  python:
    entry_points:
      - free_gpa = freesas.app.auto_gpa:main
      - free_guinier = freesas.app.auto_guinier:main
      - free_rg = freesas.app.autorg:main
      - cormapy = freesas.app.cormap:main
      - supycomb = freesas.app.supycomb:main
      - free_bift = freesas.app.bift:main
      - freesas = freesas.app.plot_sas:main
      - extract_ascii = freesas.app.extract_ascii:main

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: osx
      then: llvm-openmp
    - if: linux
      then: libgomp
    - ninja
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - wheel
    - meson-python >=0.11
    - meson >=0.64
    - cython
    - numpy
    - pyproject-metadata >=0.5.0
    - tomli >=1.0.0
    - scipy
    - silx
  run:
    - python
    - scipy
    - matplotlib-base
    - pyfai-base
    - silx
  ignore_run_exports:
    from_package:
      - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - freesas
  - script:
      - free_gpa --help
      - free_guinier --help
      - free_rg --help
      - cormapy --help
      - supycomb --help
      - free_bift --help
      - freesas --help
      - extract_ascii --help
      - freesas --version

about:
  summary: Free tools to analyze Small angle scattering data
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: http://www.silx.org/
  repository: https://github.com/silx-kit/freesas
  documentation: https://freesas.readthedocs.io

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - beenje

about.summary: Free tools to analyze Small angle scattering data
